caption.p: The administration of the hydroethanolic extract from Bridelia atroviridis (Euphorbiaceae) to nicotinamide-/streptozotocin-induced diabetic rats improves blood glucose levels confirmed by the increase of K iTT value, preventing them from anemia, leukocytopenia, and thrombocytopenia. The extract also exhibits significant regulation in the cytokine imbalance induced in diabetic conditions (Figure S1).
